DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free text field to describe the deletion of other homologous gene.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._Having two identical allelic forms of a gene, one inherited from each parent, on each of the two homologous chromosomes._A functional unit of heredity which occupies a specific position on a particular chromosome and serves as the template for a product that contributes to a phenotype or a biological function._Elimination, especially by blotting out, cutting out, or erasing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:Having two identical allelic forms of a gene, one inherited from each parent, on each of the two homologous chromosomes.:A functional unit of heredity which occupies a specific position on a particular chromosome and serves as the template for a product that contributes to a phenotype or a biological function.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
Having two identical allelic forms of a gene, one inherited from each parent, on each of the two homologous chromosomes.
A functional unit of heredity which occupies a specific position on a particular chromosome and serves as the template for a product that contributes to a phenotype or a biological function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Elimination, especially by blotting out, cutting out, or erasing.

Concepts.definition: Elimination, especially by blotting out, cutting out, or erasing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A functional unit of heredity which occupies a specific position (locus) on a particular chromosome, is capable of reproducing itself exactly at each cell division, and directs the formation of a protein or other product. The gene as a functional unit consists of a discrete segment of a giant DNA molecule containing the purine (adenine and guanine) and pyrimidine (cytosine and thymine) bases in the ordered and correct sequence that encodes a specific functional product (i.e., a protein or RNA molecule).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The text that provides a description of a topic.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.

ValueDomain.origin: FDA: FDA GUDID (Global Unique Device Identification Database)
